categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Arti Shah is an English actress who worked as a motion capture double for Lupita Nyong'o (Maz Kanata) in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens plus played a Gonk Droid and Gwellis Bagnoro. She was also a creature and droid puppeteer on Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.
